text: Bensenville is a village in Illinois in the United States. It is near O'Hare International Airport. It is in DuPage County, Illinois, with a part of the town in Cook County. ==References== Category:Villages in Illinois Category:Suburbs of Chicago Category:Settlements in Cook County, Illinois Category:Settlements in DuPage County, Illinois Category:1880s establishments in Illinois Category:1884 establishments in the United States
title: Bensenville, Illinois
